Package be.ac.ulb.infof307.g10.controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractProductController
    Common code between ShoppingListController and RecipeController.
    CreateProductController
    Controller for the creation of a Product corresponding to the CreateProduct view It is used to generate the different type of message during the creation
    CreateRecipeController
    Controller for the creation of a Recipe corresponding to the CreateRecipe view
    CreateShopController
    Controller for the CreateShop view
    CreateShoppingListController
    Controller for create shopping list view
    CreateUserController
    Controller class for the create account page His aim is to detect some wrong cases in the input password and update the errorLabel
    LoginController
    Controller of the Login view.
    MapController
    Controller class of the Google Map view.
    MapErrorController
    Controller of the popup that occurs when a JavaScript exception is caught.
    MenuController
    This class is the main controller, it implements all the methods used in the different page of the application.
    RecipeController
    Controller class of the Recipe view.
    ResearchShopController
    Controller Class of the research product view (Research)
    ShoppingListController
    Controller Class of the shopping list (ShoppingList) It is used to update the information in the different fields and
    TermsOfUseController
    Controller class of the Terms of use view
